conversation.message:
Thank you for these important follow-up questions, Parent_E. We understand that class size and staffing stability are crucial factors in your decision.

For our younger age groups, we maintain a very low ratio to ensure personalized attention and safety. Our typical class size is capped at 12 children with 2 dedicated educators, resulting in an excellent 1:6 ratio, which allows for deep engagement and individualized support.

Regarding staff rotation, consistency is a core value here. We are proud of our high staff retention rate, and we actively minimize internal rotation within classrooms. This commitment ensures that your child can develop secure, trusting relationships with their primary educators, which is foundational to their emotional and academic growth. We are extremely keen on having your child join our community and hope you feel confident in making a decision soon.
